Policy experience: I work writing policy in the UK government, and have had many major wins such as bringing in competition to the UK energy market by changing how it is regulated.
Big risk from AI: I think a big risk from AI will be data quality. I think the arguments for catastrophic risks from AI are weak.
The biggest risk from AI I think is that it could exacerbate catastrophic risks like bioterrorism or nuclear war.

Policy experience: I studied policymaking at university, and then went on to do some internships in US senators offices on policy. Since then I've been working in the corporate world on AI strategy.
Big risk from AI: I don't know much about AI risk but I'm open to learning about different types of AI risk. I've heard AI bias is a concern.
